document_data.name: Three-Seeing Eye
document_data.mainbody: '''Three-Seeing Eye''' was a [[tasked genie|tasked]] [[guardian genie]] who inhabited the fortress of [[Krak al-Niraan]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: Three-Seeing Eye was tasked with guarding the treasure room of the keep, preventing anyone but [[Jamal al-Yindannim]] or [[Yodfah al-Muluki]] from touching a single piece of [[gold]]. Any intruders would be politely warned that they would be destroyed if they attempted to touch anything within the treasure room.
document_data.History: The [[genie]] was a gift from the [[Bonfire]] to help protect the fortune of the [[Brotherhood of the True Flame]].
